definition: an adverse reaction to some political or social occurrence, to come back to the originator of an action with an undesired effect
details:
noun
- an adverse reaction to some political or social occurrence
= example: an adverse reaction to some political or social occurrence
- a movement back from an impact
= synonyms: rebound
verb
- to come back to the originator of an action with an undesired effect
= example: to come back to the originator of an action with an undesired effect
= synonyms: backfire
